products.title: Bella Blackout Snow White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout snow white electric roller blind in white. Made to measure from 138.17 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This brilliant snow white electric roller blind creates a light and airy look, so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric; to help blockout the light when desired.
 
 Product id: db-erbx02046 fabric colour: snow white material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.productdescription:
Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. 
 The bella blackout frost roller blind in a neutral white colour will suit almost any room.

products.title: Bella Blackout Paper White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout paper white electric roller blind in white. Made to measure from 140.59 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. 
 
 This paper white electric roller blind works with any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electirc roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. The light, off-white hue of this fabric will look stunning when paired with natural and darker wooden tones and will beautifully compliment cool, contemporary shades. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This white electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product id: db-erbx2136 fabric colour: paper white material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
